name: QUYNH NGUYEN
title: A bit of Data Science
description: Programming, researching, and learning data science are my joy. As I engage in problem-solving, this joy transforms into a devoted commitment.

As a business enabler, my ultimate career goal is to accelerate business with data science innovations. I achieve this by fostering strong collaborations, critical thinking, and continuous upskilling.

In terms of my technical skills, I have a good grasp of data mining, data analytics, cloud computing, web development, machine learning, and more - in which machine learning has the most of my time and passion. I love being a generalist in tech, as there's always room to improve my skills and learn new things.
Last but not least, I’m a foodie, a Picasso wannabe, and a gleeful introvert.
highlight: If your awesome data team needs some more hands, I got you. I'm looking forward an opportunities to bring data science solutions to level up the business performance. So, if you think we could be a good match, please reach out to me!

education.school: S P Jain School of Global Management

task: Deliver analytics and AI solutions that empower stakeholders across business functions to work more efficiently and make informed decisions.
Collaborate closely to identify needs, break down problems, propose practical solutions, and ensure reliable delivery.
Stay up-to-date with the latest data and AI technologies to continuously improve problem-solving.
Managed and ingested data using Google BigQuery and Amazon Redshift, transforming it with SQL and dbt, while ensuring data accuracy and reliable insights through Git version control.
Developed compelling visualisations in Metabase and Tableau, applying statistical methods like A/B testing and regression analysis to inform strategic business decisions.
Built AI solutions and proofs of concept using Python, Stream lit, Vertex AI, GCP Cloud Run, and Docker to address business challenges.
Designed and implemented the first end-to-end ML pipeline on GCP Vertex AI, managing data ingestion to production deployment by researching and testing tools to meet business needs.
Created AI systems to enhance data accessibility, personalise patient journeys, support clinical staff, and build models for churn prediction and sentiment analysis.
Closely partnered with founders to understand the business, define and propose core business KPIs, focusing on user engagement and learning outcomes.
Developed and optimised SQL queries and BigQuery stored procedures, significantly improving data processing efficiency and supporting the analysis of large-scale user event data.
Designed and maintained interactive dashboards in Metabase, delivering insightful visualizations that track user journeys and conversion metrics, enabling data-driven decision-making.
Collaborated with professionals in co-working sessions and hackathons to explore and develop innovative AI solutions.
Created and presented AI proof-of-concepts (POC), showcasing AI’s potential to address critical challenges in Healthcare and Food Waste
Engaged in insightful discussions, asking targeted questions to understand AI concepts, and provided constructive feedback to improve solutions.
Developed technical proficiency in Python for AI development, applying core programming skills to build effective AI systems.
Extract clients and deals data from the CRM system using SQL; Preprocess raw data to ensure consistency and accuracy with Python.
Perform comprehensive analysis to discover significant insights related to customer expectations and acceptance of offers, identifying opportunities for improvement.
Create a mathematical model employing to segment customers to optimize the sales process, enhancing efficiency, and potentially optimizing sales process by 20%.
Build a text mining model to extract customer interests from associates’ call and appointment notes.
Work with cross-functional teams to explain model features and communicate insights.
Conduct comprehensive research on technical indicators and models, with a specific focus on moving average models.
Apply technical analysis concepts to design and develop a Python-based model for ETF trading recommendations, integrating moving average models.
Achieve a milestone of 12% higher annual returns compared to a baseline model.
Prepare and communicate detailed reports on model methodology, model performance, exhibits, and investment recommendations.
skill: Research Methodology and Writing in Finance

task: Ensuring data accuracy and integrity of the databases by automating the data validation process.
Conduct web scraping to gather external data sources and compiled the information.
Build interactive dashboards and reports using Microsoft PowerBI, and DAX language skills.
Communicate insights and findings to managers and stakeholders using well-structured reports and presentations.

experience.company: Think Tanks and Civil Societies Program
task: Research the status of over 200 think tanks and the impact of these institutions on public policy and civil society in Southeast Asia.
Collect, process and cross-check data about think tanks.
Use Microsoft Excel to analyse statistical summaries and visualise data.
Write a report to explain the findings and create visualizations about the developing trends of these think tanks.
Analyse the current trends using Google Trends and develop the marketing plan.
Run and monitor marketing campaigns.
Design media posts, flyers, and brochures.
Write contents for events, promotions, products, and campaigns of the company.

project.name: Clinical Consultation Analysis with AI Transcription
description: The app enhances clinical consultations by transcribing audio recordings into text and analyzing them with AI to extract key details about diet, lifestyle, and symptoms. It generates concise summaries for easy follow-ups, helps manage appointments with calendar integration, and allows users to securely share health summaries with doctors, family, or friends. This tool aims to improve healthcare engagement, streamline communication, and support better treatment outcomes.

project.name: LLM Evaluation Custom Dataset
description: The LLM Evaluation Custom Dataset app provides a simple interface for evaluating language models using your datasets. With support for exact and relative match testing, it enables users to upload datasets, configure model details, enter prompts, and evaluate performance. The app handles datasets in CSV or Excel formats, requiring two columns: test_input and label.

project.name: Pickle Recipe: Using AI to reduce Food Waste
description: The Pickle Recipe app is an AI-powered tool that generates recipes and corresponding recipe photos based on user inputs like ingredients, leftovers, cooking time, and difficulty level.  This app utilizes an AI agent which users can interact with via email to request recipes and receive the generated recipe and photo.

project.name: SQL Query Assistant with AI
description: Developed a user-friendly platform enabling users to generate customized SQL queries tailored to their database system utilizing GCP Codey, Gemini Pro, and ChatGPT.
Implemented robust data validation features allowing users to conduct unit checks on output data, including missing value, null value, and value range checks.
Enhanced query accuracy by dynamically providing relevant query examples using a RAG system, incorporating vector search capabilities.
Utilized Streamlit to create an intuitive and interactive user interface for seamless user experience.

Conducted extensive research on foundational models, testing their efficacy on graph and vector databases for the RAG system, while exploring UI frameworks such as Streamlit and React.js for optimal performance.
Successfully presented a compelling demo to Euc's data team, effectively introducing the project and garnering approval for its integration into Euc's data analysis workflow.

project.name: CRM Usability Categorization
description: Query the data from CRM system using SQL and prepare the data with Pandas and Numpy.
Build a mathematical model to define the level of compatibility betwen company's resources and client's requirements.
Build a text-mining model to analyze clients and sellers' comments to understand the client' needs and issues.
Leverage object-oriented programming to generate a CRM record object that can define its usability with information verification and status categorization.
Employ Apache Hadoop to process all historical records in the CRM system.

project.name: Identifying Buy/Sell Signals using the Moving Average Model
description: Apply the Moving Average Model to generate buy/sell/hold signals on the data of different ETFs from Yahoo Finance
Contribute to the programming algorithm of the model
Visualise the exhibits using Matplotlib, PowerBI and Microsoft Excel.

project.name: Customer Segmentation with Clustering Algorithms
description: Exploratory Data Analysis to analyse the pattern of the data before fitting the data into the model.

Data Cleaning and Preparation includes handling with missing values, unappropriate values and outliers. Besides, feature engineering, standardization and PCA method are also applied to improve the efficiency when fitting the data in the model.

Unsupervised Machine Learning - Clustering task: fitting the data into K-means clustering and Agglomerative Clustering, visualising the results, evaluating the performance and intepreting the most efficienct clustering result.

project.name: Nintendo Switch Game Recommendation
description: Scrape the game title and description from Wikipedia using BeautifulSoup4 and clean the data with Pandas.
Extract features from the game description using text mining techniques: text tokenizing, TF-IDF Vectorization
Recommend the game by finding the similar games with K-Mean Clustering and Cosine similarity.

project.name: Rotten Fruit Classification
description: Build model that classify three types of fruits (orange, banana, apple) and its status (fresh or rotten).
Process the image and train the model using neutral network and transfer learning (VGG16 and ResNet50)

project.name: Cloud Usage Dashboard
description: A dashboard using multiple visual types (Table, Map, Bar Chart, Treemap, Scorecard), filter and DAX language to analyze the cloud usage by location, company, and category.

project.name: E-commerce Interface: Pokemon Shop
description: A website using HTML, CSS and responsive front-end techniques to introduce about Hue City, Vietnam

project.name: Static Website: Introduction to Hue
description: A website using HTML, CSS and responsive front-end techniques to introduce about Hue City, Vietnam

project.name: Predicting House Prices using Multiple Regression
description: Apply the knowledge about Linear Regression to observe the relationship between variables and predict the future value of a property.
Achieve the 11% difference between the model's prediction and the actual value.

qualification.description: Fundamentals of MLOps, key technologies like Python, Docker, MLflow, deployment strategies, and monitoring.

qualification.certiname: Big Data Specialisation, University of San Diago
qualification.description: Big Data Modeling and Management Systems, Graph Analytics for Big Data, Big Data Integration and Processing, Machine Learning With Big Data.
Query optimization, data modeling, Indexing, window functions, and pivots in SQL.
Build ML models with NumPy & scikit-learn, build & train supervised and unsupervised models.

qualification.certiname: Getting Started with Deep Learning, NVIDIA DLI
qualification.description: Data Augmentation and Deployment, Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, Pre-Trained Model.
Foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
Statistics, Data Exploratory Analysis, Visualization with Python
Foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure data services.
